ModMetaData.name: Extended traits
ModMetaData.author: Caminha
ModMetaData.description:
Adds new traits!
- Swiftfoot - Sluggish - Good reflexes - Bad reflexes - Toxicity Resistance - Toxicity Intolerant - Toxicity Sensitive - Glutton - Nibbler - Healthy - Frail constitution - Social butterfly - Silver-tongued - Stutterer - Perfectionist - Nyctophobe
